name: Special Delivery
description: Dodge cars, dogs and tornadoes as you grow your subscriber base and expand your paper route in this arcade inspired newspaper delivery game.
minimum_requirements: 最低配置: 需要 64 位处理器和操作系统 操作系统: Windows 7 SP1 or newer 处理器: Intel Core i5 4590 or greater 内存: 8 GB RAM 图形: GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 or better DirectX 版本: 10 存储空间: 需要 650 MB 可用空间 附注事项: Generation X or older. Not suitable for children under the age of 25. This game was designed to be hard, like old games...that were...hard.
recommended_requirements: 推荐配置: 需要 64 位处理器和操作系统
